title: Genome Assembly of a bacterial genome (MRSA) sequenced using Illumina MiSeq Data
questions: How to check the quality of the MiSeq data?
How to perform an assembly of a bacterial genome with MiSeq data?
How to check the quality of an assembly?
objectives: Run tools to evaluate sequencing data on quality and quantity
Process the output of quality control tools
Improve the quality of sequencing data
Run a tool to assemble a bacterial genome using short reads
Run tools to assess the quality of an assembly
Understand the outputs of tools to assess the quality of an assembly
key_points: Illumina assemblies can be done with Shovill
It is hard to get the genome in one contig

workflows.name: Genome Assembly of MRSA using Illumina MiSeq Data
workflows.title: Genome Assembly of MRSA using Illumina MiSeq Data
workflows.description: Genome Assembly of MRSA using Illumina MiSeq Data

history.message: Add license and creator to workflows
Update the MRSA short-read assembly tutorial
